faqs.a: Normal wedding cocktail attire for ceremony and reception. Smart casual for the rehearsal dinner and casual for Sunday brunch.
We kindly ask that only those listed on your invitation attend. If you have questions, email us at hello@example.com.
We love your little ones! However, our wedding will be an adults-only celebration. Exceptions will be noted on invitations.
Please note any dietary restrictions on your RSVP. We’ll do our best to accommodate gluten-free, vegetarian, vegan, and allergies.
Yes, parking is available at the venue, and rideshare is encouraged. See Venue & Travel for details.
Ceremony starts at 4:30 PM. Please park at The Piedmont Club and walk 1 minute to the church. We'll walk back to The Piedmont Club at 5:00 PM for the reception.

faqs.q: Can we take photos or post on social media?
faqs.a: We’re happy for you to capture memories during the reception. During the ceremony, we kindly request you keep phones away.

faqs.q: Who can I contact with other questions?
faqs.a: Email us at hello@example.com and we’ll get back to you as soon as we can.
